thread.title: United Spirit Nordic appointed by Destination Asia to lead business evelopment in Nordic region
thread.title_full: United Spirit Nordic appointed by Destination Asia to lead business evelopment in Nordic region

author: Assignment Editor
title: United Spirit Nordic appointed by Destination Asia to lead business evelopment in Nordic region
text:
United Spirit Nordic appointed by Destination Asia to lead business evelopment in Nordic region   
Sep 07, 2015 eTN   
Destination Asia has appointed Christine Engen, CEO of United Spirit Nordic located in Denmark, to represent and promote Destination Asia’s meetings and incentive, corporate meetings and leisure business in Norway, Sweden, Finland, and Denmark. As Destination Asia continues to expand, Christine will align United Spirit Nordic services with the growing demand of business and leisure travel to Asia from Northern Europe. The partnership will provide customers with "world best" Asia operations supported by in-market sales and marketing expertise. The new investment will complement Destination Asia’s existing sales and marketing team located in their Head Office in Bangkok. 
A Norwegian native, Christine established United Spirit Nordic in 2003 and has more than 26 years of experience in the travel trade industry. Destination Asia said, “Christine’s extensive knowledge and high attention to customer service complements Destination Asia’s values in delivering not only outstanding travel services, but in surpassing client expectations.” 
Destination Asia’s focus on Asia-only operations positions them to deliver unparalleled value to customers seeking unique experiences. Their position within the market will now be significantly enhanced by the expertise of Christine and her team at United Spirit Nordic. 
The Destination Asia operating offices to be represented by United Spirit Nordic are Thailand, Vietnam, China, Japan, Hong Kong, Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Cambodia, Burma and Laos.
